Introduction

Luhan is a Chinese singer and actor. He is a former member of the boy group EXO and their subgroup EXO-M. He was a main vocalist and dancer. He left the group and agency after filing a lawsuit to terminate his contract in October 2014 which led him to leaving the group with fellow member Kris who left a few months earlier.

Since leaving, he has been active in Mandopop/C-pop under Rock Forward Entertainment, releasing his first solo song "That Good Good". He was also a cast member of Running Man China until 2019.
